        solver.add(start_times[friends_list[i]] >= current_time)
    else:
        prev_friend = friends_list[i-1]
        current_friend = friends_list[i]
        # Ensure the current friend's location is different from the previous friend's location
        solver.add(locations[current_friend] != locations[prev_friend])
        # Ensure the current friend starts after the previous friend finishes and travel time
        solver.add(start_times[current_friend] >= start_times[prev_friend] + friends[prev_friend][2] + If(
            locations[prev_friend] == locations[current_friend],
            0,
            travel_times[(locations[prev_friend], locations[current_friend])]
        ))

        start_time = model[start_times[name]].as_long()
        location = model[locations[name]].as_string()
        schedule.append((name, start_time, start_time + friends[name][2], location))
    
    # Sort the schedule by start time
    schedule.sort(key=lambda x: x[1])
    
    print("SOLUTION:")
    for name, start, end, location in schedule:
        print(f"{name}: {start//60}:{start%60:02d} - {end//60}:{end%60:02d} at {location}")
else:
    print("No solution found.")
